about_the_game:
Make Your Mark In the World Of Advertising!

Ad Agency Simulator offers a realistic simulation experience for those looking to embark on a career in the advertising industry. Are you ready to start creating your own advertising designs and managing your advertising agency, starting from a small advertising office?



Career Journey: Start with a small office and a computer, design and manage various advertising projects such as logos, signage, posters, billboards, etc., from various businesses in the city.

Design and Implementation: Bring your projects to life with original designs and place them all around the city. Increase your popularity through customer satisfaction and feedback.



Money and Popularity: Earn money by completing projects and increase your popularity by ensuring customer satisfaction. As you grow, take on bigger and more important projects.

Dive into the World of Advertising: Learn the intricacies of the advertising industry and take the necessary steps to become a successful advertiser. Impress your clients with your creative ideas.

Forge Your Own Path: Determine how you will manage your company with in-game decisions. Do you want to expand your client base or specialize? The choice is yours!

Ad Agency Simulator is here to provide you with the complexity and excitement of the advertising world! Are you ready to build your own advertising empire?

About the Game



Make Your Mark In the World Of Advertising!

Ad Agency Simulator offers a realistic simulation experience for those looking to embark on a career in the advertising industry. Are you ready to start creating your own advertising designs and managing your advertising agency, starting from a small advertising office?



Career Journey: Start with a small office and a computer, design and manage various advertising projects such as logos, signage, posters, billboards, etc., from various businesses in the city.

Design and Implementation: Bring your projects to life with original designs and place them all around the city. Increase your popularity through customer satisfaction and feedback.



Money and Popularity: Earn money by completing projects and increase your popularity by ensuring customer satisfaction. As you grow, take on bigger and more important projects.

Dive into the World of Advertising: Learn the intricacies of the advertising industry and take the necessary steps to become a successful advertiser. Impress your clients with your creative ideas.

Forge Your Own Path: Determine how you will manage your company with in-game decisions. Do you want to expand your client base or specialize? The choice is yours!

Ad Agency Simulator is here to provide you with the complexity and excitement of the advertising world! Are you ready to build your own advertising empire?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.0
  • Processor: Apple M1 veya Intel Core M.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 630 or similar
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: Apple M1 veya Intel Core M.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 or similar
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Ad Agency Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2080 / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Ad Agency Simulator offers a realistic simulation experience for those looking to embark on a career in the advertising industry. Are you ready to start creating your own advertising designs and managing your advertising agency, starting from a small advertising office?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Spanish - Spain, Vietnamese
